content: Love becomes more valuable when faced with the inevitability of death because it highlights the impermanence of life and underscores the importance of cherishing the time we have with loved ones. Knowing that time is limited and that death is inevitable can bring a sense of urgency to relationships and make us appreciate the moments we have with those we care about. The awareness of mortality can also help us to prioritize what is truly important in life and avoid getting caught up in trivial matters. Furthermore, the fear of losing a loved one can deepen our sense of connection and strengthen our bonds with one another. In this way, the idea of mortality can transform love into something more profound and meaningful.
